website_summaries.verdict: This 2-in-1 oil-free foundation and concealer delivers a beautiful, flawless finish and comes in a wide collection of shades. Fans find it worth the effort to find the one that matches.
pros: Works as both a foundation and a concealer that provides lightweight yet full coverage with a matte finish
Wears for hours without fading or caking for most users
Comes with an applicator that makes it easy to apply around the eyes
cons: Some shades appear lighter or darker once applied than they do in the bottle, making it somewhat challenging to find your perfect shade

customer_reviews.title: Best foundation for full but natural looking coverage
customer_reviews.text: Best foundation I've tried - and I've tried literally everything. My skin is t-zone oily and I like full coverage. Love the 1 product efficiency. Put on a few swipes and blend with a brush and done. Covers dark cirles, uneven skin tone and I don't even need primer and separate undereye cover.
customer_reviews.author: MissWright

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Clingue for being a dependable makeup brand!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only foundation that I will use. The coverage is amazing and it wears super light weight. I have a deep tissue scar under my right eye where the skin is a lot darker than the rest of my face and compares to a "black eye" or looks like my "make-up is running." This foundation covers it almost completely and stays on until I take it off. Thank you Clinique for being a dependable makeup brand!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Cashwell

customer_reviews.title: Great for spot coverage
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time trying this product and I’m glad I did. I’ve been using the neutral color powder but wanted more coverage in areas that tend to redden due to acne or dry skin. This does the trick. I don’t wear as an all over foundation but am very satisfied with the spot coverage without looking caked on. Even does good for dark circle under eye days.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Got it even earlier and truly, its seems to be a good foundation
customer_reviews.text: So, I've got the foundation in the shade Neutral and from the first try I can say that Im quite satisfied with the product. I have dry skin and its goes well, color is nice, So I think at the end I finished searching my perfect foundation. I definitely should add, that when I asked the seller to try to send it on time (as the estimated shipping time was quite long), they really gave me a favor and did it as soon as they could, so thank you for that!.
customer_reviews.author: Salome

customer_reviews.title: Need to know your shade before you buy
customer_reviews.text: It was totally the wrong shade for my skin. It is impossible to find the correct shade on here. ..I do love Clinique though and will be buying this product in a store where I can try it first. If I knew my shade..it would be great!
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite facefoundation! It stays on and gives great coverage
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite facefoundation! It stays on and gives great coverage! I will not use anything else. Only thing is I wish it has sunscreen in it...
customer_reviews.author: Joanie

customer_reviews.title: Does the product have expiration date?
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product but I wonder if there is an expiration date. It has an odor, a rancid odor, like it has passed it's life date. I would like to know for sure. The coverage is really good, I like the applicator and it doesn't leave my face feeling dry.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Rossman

customer_reviews.title: Product seemed old and was almost empty.
customer_reviews.text: I wear this foundation every day and when I put it on, it was thicker and dry and I am very allergic to many products. My eyes were burning after I put it on. Something wasn't right. Won't do this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not so good.
customer_reviews.text: So disappointing. It’s so thick and goopy that even application is difficult and it doesn’t stick to your skin. It oxidizes halfway through the day even after using a primer and setting spray. Also, it seems as if the bottle is only half way full! Did I get an old dried-out product?
customer_reviews.author: Violetpugs

customer_reviews.title: Clinique foundation/concealer
customer_reviews.text: This one is hard to find since they discontinued this particular #. Goes on smooth and stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: TPars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect match for me, and it covers better than concealer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: Love this makeup its a quick way to get ready and have good coverage!
customer_reviews.author: karla

customer_reviews.title: It is beyond perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just as I ordered it. I was afraid I wouldn't find it again... bought the previous one, which I ran out recently, back in CDMX... but Thank God it's still available and I found it. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Andrade Lee

customer_reviews.title: Really covers pores and Imperfections
customer_reviews.text: This is a great great product. It is hard to blend so I mix it with Clinique dramatically different moisturizing gel and it goes on flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: sherlock

customer_reviews.title: Conceals without looking thick.
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for years. Really has a nice finish look.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Love this foundation
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this foundation. How easily it goes on and blends in perfectly with your skin color.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Manning

customer_reviews.title: Good makeup
customer_reviews.text: Like the makeup. The first one I got was in the right box, but had the wrong color in it-had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie H.

customer_reviews.title: and have always liked it.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product before, and have always liked it.. This only thing wrong was I got a darker color than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Great coverage. Sometimes I will mix it with a little dermacol if I need that extra coverage and stay power.
customer_reviews.author: A V

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this foundation, it is full coverage but I use it pretty much as an everyday wear. It matches my skin perfectly and goes on so well.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Denney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent coverage and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for years! Easy to apply with the applicator stick. Covers uneven skin tone beautifully without being heavy on your skin. Love this product! It's magic!
customer_reviews.author: JULIE

customer_reviews.title: Orange in color.
customer_reviews.text: Very surprised this product didn't meet the reviews. Very Orange in color and didn't blend well at all into skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kaci

customer_reviews.title: Right and correct item
customer_reviews.text: Hi my name is Mojan Mozaffari First you put my items behind my neibor 's door And you sent another number of clinic foundation it's too dark and not right color of my skin l have to return it
customer_reviews.author: Mojan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage and color! Blends well with a make-up brush.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Q.

customer_reviews.title: Love the make up.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the make up it's just what I ordered
customer_reviews.author: Don R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: perfect coverage - doesn't look cakey
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product. It gives great coverage without streaking or feeling too thick.
customer_reviews.author: LittleMissSkept321

customer_reviews.title: Nothing.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to exchange mine it was wrong and I was denied. Bad for business.
customer_reviews.author: mary collins

customer_reviews.title: I love the flawless look it creates
customer_reviews.text: I have tried it to find the color fit my skin at Sephora. I love the flawless look it creates.
customer_reviews.author: Lan

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the consistency of this makeup and the coverage it gives.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Full coverage
customer_reviews.text: Full coverage but not too much! Have used this kind for a few years now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice foundation. The only thing i found it cheaper in Sephora :)
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana O.

customer_reviews.title: The color is diferent
customer_reviews.text: The base color is not the same to the Clinique ivory 6 that I has been using from Macys.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is this even the same product?
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this before, but this time it was a completely different bottle/shade etc than what I had ordered previously.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Maguire

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: This arrived with the seal broken and almost 1/3 of the foundation missing..
customer_reviews.author: Amber & Flori

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Best concealing foundation I have ever used! Covers well without caking and settling into "mature" skin lines and wrinkles. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: carbonxc

customer_reviews.title: Favorite cover up/concealer
customer_reviews.text: Love this cover up! Easy to use and good for sensitive skin and sensitive eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Sarahbish

customer_reviews.title: This is the best product I have come across in a long time
customer_reviews.text: I am in my 40's and I have dry skin. This is the best product I have come across in a long time. Easy to apply, excellent smooth coverage.
customer_reviews.author: jkride

customer_reviews.title: Huge fan
customer_reviews.text: Huge fan. I get told my skin looks great and that I’m not wearing make up. It’s awesome because it has the same undertones as my skin tone which is important for someone with red skin. I like to use it with a redness reducing primer
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Best concealer/foundation by Clinique
customer_reviews.text: The perfect concealer and foundation. Great but light coverage. Easy to match skin type and Clinque’s usual high quality. Goes on easily with a sponge or brush. Blends well.
customer_reviews.author: HistoryBuff

customer_reviews.title: Best ice ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I love this foundation. It’s more expensive than drugstore brands, obviously. However the coverage is second to none and a bottle lasts me an entire year with almost everyday use. I’m on my third bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amber M.

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage!
customer_reviews.text: Literally thee best foundation. I took a chance and ordered it online after reading the reviews. I love the coverage and it lasts all day. It is a but dark but I'm tan so this will be my summer foundation.
customer_reviews.author: ashley rustad

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good foundation but I bought the wrong color for myself but gave to a friend and she loves it
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Dissa
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this it's like face powder to me never thin and was not what I expected
customer_reviews.author: Cherry

customer_reviews.title: It was not old smelling.
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a foundation to hide blemishes bf putting on my make up.
customer_reviews.author: EV

customer_reviews.title: Great Priduct
customer_reviews.text: have been using this product for years People say that I don’t look my age90 plus
customer_reviews.author: Constance Sadek list ofer

customer_reviews.title: I usually have to use a sponge to blend better.
customer_reviews.text: The makeup goes on a little to heavy. I usually have to use a sponge to blend better.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: I like this product but I have to use care in ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this product but I have to use care in applying as it goes on a little heavy. I just need to get used to it as I have used another brand for a long time. It is a good concealer.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: but no everything was perfect; Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what was pictured, completely legit, I was worried about it being the wrong brand or shade, but no everything was perfect; Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Cancel

customer_reviews.title: This foundation is better than most concealers that I have tried
customer_reviews.text: This foundation is better than most concealers that I have tried. It covers darks spots without highlighting my wrinkles. It's my favorite make-up.
customer_reviews.author: checkers

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The foundation is kind of thick; and for something that is so full coverage (which is fine), I would expect it not to need to be reapplied halfway throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Not as advertised. It is a compact, not a liquid foundation.
customer_reviews.author: johnson5603

customer_reviews.title: Great combination
customer_reviews.text: Great combination foundation and concealer. I use it either for full coverage or simply to cover up a few spots. Works well with my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: Coverage for Rosacea
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding coverage for helping blur pores and cover rosacea redness.
customer_reviews.author: ShireFox

customer_reviews.title: Received liquid
customer_reviews.text: Received the liquid...not the powder as shown in product picture. Right shade. Wrong product though
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas B.

product_meta.title: Clinique Beyond Perfecting Foundation + Concealer - CN 28 Ivory 30ml / 1 fl.oz.
product_meta.description: Color:# 6 Ivory (VF-N)| Size:1 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)Lightweight. Moisturizing makeup. Perfected look that lasts all day. This product is manufactured in Ukraine.
feature_bullets: Perfected look that lasts all day
